full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DIR GDON BGEGS KYI GNOD PA DANG NAD KYIS GZIR PA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I GTOR MA DANG GLUD RDZOGS BYA BA'I RIM PA NI, ,
